net.sf.jclal.listener

Class ClassicalReporterListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.listener.ClassicalReporterListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IAlgorithmListener, IConfigure, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphicalReporterListener, RealScenarioListener

    public class ClassicalReporterListener
extends Object
implements IAlgorithmListener, IConfigure
    This class is a listener for ClassicalALAlgorithm. It performs a report of the actual iteration.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration of Classical Reporter Listener. The XML labels supported are:
        • report-title= String, default= untitled
        • report-directory= String, default= reports
        • report-frequency= int
        • report-on-console= boolean
        • report-on-file= boolean
        • send-email= class

          Package: net.sf.jclal.util.mail

          Class: All

      • algorithmStarted

        public void algorithmStarted(AlgorithmEvent event)
        This event is fired when the algorithm has completed normally.
        Specified by:
        algorithmStarted in interface IAlgorithmListener
        Parameters:

      • algorithmStarted

        public void algorithmStarted(Date date,
                             String datasetName,
                             int testSize,
                             int labeledSetSize,
                             int unlabeledSetSize,
                             String batchMode,
                             int bacthSize,
                             String classifierName,
                             String scenarioName,
                             String strategyName)
        Is executed after the algorithm begins, prepares the conditions of the report: in case of requesting report in file, it creates and keeps the basic configuration of the experiment.
        Parameters:
        date - The starting date
        datasetName - The name of dataset
        testSize - The size of the test set
        labeledSetSize - The size of the labelled set
        unlabeledSetSize - The size of the unlabelled set
        batchMode - The name of the batch strategy
        bacthSize - The size of the batch
        classifierName - The name of the base classifier
        scenarioName - The name of the scenario
        strategyName - The name of the active learning strategy
